attributes.action: Stop Gordon Brown's Suggestion for Migrants to take Community Work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How should new arrivals prove their commitment to citizenship?

Immigrants should carry out community work before being granted UK citizenship, Chancellor Gordon Brown is expected to say in a seminar on Britishness.

Mr Brown believes this idea would demonstrate to society that migrants will contribute.

The chancellor's comments follow his earlier call for immigrants to learn English and for the UK to have a day to celebrate national identity.

I THINK THIS IS A JOKE. WHAT ABOUT THE DAY TO DAY INVOLMENT OF MIGRANTS AT THE WORK PLACE, TUBE STATION, SCHOOL, MARKET, SUPERMARKET, THE COURTS, SPORTS GROUNDS, SCHOOLS ETC. I THINK THIS IS RIDICULOUS AND NEEDS RETHINKING BY GORDON. WHAT A SHAME THIS IS WHAT HE CAME UP WITH INSTEAD OF SOME CONSTRUCTIVE POLICY TOWARDS INTEGRATION AND EMBRACING MULTICULTRALISM.
